message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more than $14,000. I could meet you halfway at $17,000. This is my final offer.
Alice,  I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  While I value the product, $17,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $15,500.  This is my final offer.
